Description: Finance admin approvers can approve low value PRs
Low Threshold Multiplier to set the boundary between 1 quote (if vendor is approved revert to zero quotes required) or [rule 4] quotes (if vendor is approved revert to floor)

Items below this high value threshold (and above rule 1 * rule 2) require [rule 4] quotes unless the vendor is approved; above the threshold [rule 4] quotes, [rule 5] unique approvers, and adjudication notes are always required
Number of Quotes required above minimum floor of 1 quote
Number of approvers required for high value expenditures
